description: Attackers may leverage fsutil to enumerated connected drives.
false_positives: Certain software or administrative tasks may trigger false positivies.
name: Fsutil Drive Enumeration
references: Turla has used fsutil fsinfo drives to list connected drives. https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1120/
author: Christopher Peacock '@securepeacock'
SCYTHE '@scythe_io'
